text: "Sweetheart Like You" is a 1983 song by Bob Dylan and is the second single from his 22nd studio album Infidels. It peaked at number 55 in the United States and number 74 in Australia. It was covered by Rod Stewart for his 17th studio album A Spanner in the Works. ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Bob Dylan songs Category:Rod Stewart songs
title: Sweetheart Like You
